resources.string: No data was entered to search on...

Sorry that wasn\'t the beer you scanned. If you\'d like, you can modify the name we have on file and we\'ll take another crack at it. Maybe be more descriptive than the last guy, unless of course it was you who entered it. In that case, great job! :)
(Please be as descriptive as possible. Include the name of the brewery as well. For example: "New Belgium Brewing Fat Tire Ale")
Sorry, there must have been some error. No UPC code was recieved after the scan.
Sorry, the UPC lookup seemed to fail. Either the request couldn\'t be sent (do you have service?) or the server didn\'t respond correctly. Please try again later.
Sorry, the server responded with something unexpected. Please try again later.
Sorry, there was an error sending the UPC code to the lookup server. Please try again.
Sorry, the lookup timed out. We must be getting slammed with people looking for beer. Please try again in a little bit.
Please fill out a beer description
Sorry, there was a problem sending that description to the server.
Sorry, we weren\'t able to find any results for that UPC code. If you are up to the task, would you like to make our app better? Please fill out the name of the beer you scanned below!
We found a name for that beer, but we couldn\'t seem to find any ratings for it. The name is entered below. If you tweak the description, we might be able to find the ratings for it.
